distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-8177: Fixed an issue where curl could have been tricked by a malicious server to overwrite a local file when using the -J option (bsc#1173027).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: curl 7.20.0 through 7.70.0 is vulnerable to improper restriction of names for files and other resources that can lead too overwriting a local file when the -J flag is used.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
